reviews.review: yes

You know, i've had fun in this game, yes.
But to be fair, i cannot just recommend it to a lot of people out there. buggy messes, unfun chasing, theres bad balance between killers and survivors, and it just becomes extremely tedious overall.

A lot of perks are busted, and the hitbox is complete trash.
It's fun with friends, and sometimes by yourself, but expect a lot to be angered, to mess around a lot, and to find yourself with tons of toxic people.

Wait for sale to get it, or don't get it at all. Pick your poison.

camp camp camp
jogo top

i have played this game for years on various platforms and never if my years of this game has the hit registration been so god awful. When I'm survivor, the killer's hit will travel farther than my dad did getting the milk. The killers swings will cross light-years to connect to my player model. And oh boy is it even worse on killer. i have hit survivors through walls, pallets, and lockers. I have stopped running perks on killer to make the game fair. My ping never exceeds 35, so this is not a network issue nor is there packet loss. Killer has never been easier to play and the opposite for survivor. Survivor has become a task. I would rather fight a silver back gorilla with my fingers in chinese finger traps, and a 40 lb weight carrier around my torso in ankle shackles than play survivor. Sometimes it's a skill issue, this can happen from time to time and I'm fine with it.  But Most of the time its my team-mates not doing gens. So I do what any reasonable man would do and play with friends. This just leads to annoying face camping killers. And with the games poor ranking system, you lose "MMR" if you don't escape. You could do gens, loop the killer, get unhooks, and even save the game for nothing if you don't escape. There are only so many purple flashlights I can lose before my sanity takes a toll. This must be a recent thing but the game has never been in a terrible state and I feel like the devs don't care? I love this game dearly but after 6 years you would think the game would be polished. Also, what about cross-progression? I thought it would have released by now but as of 7/29/22 (29/7/22) it is still non-existent

So basically play this game if you hate yourself.
Fun for about two games once a week.

Juego divertido y con gran variedad de obsesiones para elegir.

Garbage tier balance. Always survivor sided. They buff killers 1 gram and then give survivors new broken toys, such as circle of healing and the new off the record perk. good luck having fun as killer. literally clueless developers.

Scary at first then starts to become competitive. Eventually you say "screw it" and just start have fun....I think... overall very addicting to the point where you want to smash your computer, but at the same time you can't stop playing it. Love and Hate type of relationship with this game.
Seems like a fun game but the matchmaking is broken, 8 hours in and getting paired with prestige 3 level killers :/

One of the worst new player experiences you can ever get in a video game. 
Remember, it's your fault for not having hundreds of hours grinding the most meta perks.

Aside from that, why are unlocks limited in an online multiplayer game when you have no control out of any of the rng like maps which can screw you over so much as a killer?

It can be fun with friends, but that doesn't make it a good game.

Mir hat das Spiel sehr lange SpaÃŸ gemacht... Und die Entwickler sind wirklich sehr eifrig dabei das Spiel zu verbessern. Aber ich muss auch sagen, seit dem ich dieses Spiel spiele haben die Entwickler immer nur was fÃ¼r die Killer gemacht was den Spielfluss betrifft und die Survivor stÃ¤ndig generft... Aber man ist ein braver Survivor und passt sich den neuen Schwierigkeiten an, wÃ¤hrend man den Killern immer mehr das Denken abnimmt. Leider muss ich mich nach dem letzten Update (meine GeldbÃ¶rse mÃ¶ge es mir verzeihen) wohl von diesem Spiel verabschieden. Die Killer sind jetzt Gott gleich und als normaler Survivor ohne SWF (Survive with friends) bist du verloren (80% der Survivor sind bestimmt nicht SWF). Die Entwickler wollen wohl nur noch den Leuten Freude machen, die SWF spielen und den Killern es so einfach wie mÃ¶glich machen. Mir hat man mit dem letzten Update meine Spielfreude kaputt gemacht. InstÃ¤ndig hoffe ich, dass sich die SchÃ¶pfer dieses tollen Spiels noch besinnen. Denke so geht es vielen Survivor....KÃ¶nnte jetzt noch soviel mehr schreiben, was ich an diesem Spiel mal mochte, aber mein Frustlevel in der aktuellen Situation ist soviel hÃ¶her. Schade ich mochte dieses Spiel, es war eine schÃ¶ne Zeit... (normalerweise schreibe ich keine Rezensionen, aber dieses Spiel hat mich letztendlich maÃŸlos enttÃ¤uscht in der Entwicklung.)

Great game if you like thinking and planning for 2 steps ahead. They have a wide variety of perks and special abilities. you have 2 types of classes, survivors and killers.

Do you wanna have the thrills of working with others to survive when all you can do, at most, is annoy or work against your adversary? Do you want to hunt down players and eviscerate them while having a good time? Play this. Not for the faintest of heart. Is full of QTEs for "skill" on the survivor side. I'm not usually a big fan, but it worked for me here :)
